== PNW Art Package ==

== Project Overview ==
 '''Type:''' Proposed

 '''Last updated on:''' 2-29-2008

 '''Location:''' http://pnw.bartelltech.com/image

=== Purpose/Problem Statement ===
The pacific northwest is one of the most beautiful area's in the world.  Lets combine our team's picture taking ability to provide nice backgrounds for people locally and abroad alike. 

=== Mission ===
To bring a decent background picture package to all.

=== Submission Details ===
 '''Minimum resolution:''' 1024x768

 '''Due date to be submitted:''' 6-26-2008

 '''Submit to:''' http://pnw.bartelltech.com/image

Yes, there is slightly more work involved with making an account, but that would have to be done anyway to vote. When adding a picture to the website, make sure you select "2007 Art Contest"

<nowiki>[[File:screenshot.png]]</nowiki>

Note: you may at any time change your vote should the need come.

=== Objectives ===
* Make a nice background worthy package
** Get package in the main repo's
* 2-5 of the best for ISO's

=== Communication Plan ===
Team will utilize our mailing list ''(ubuntu-us-pnw@lists.ubuntu.com)'' and associated <nowiki>[[http://pnw.ubuntu-us.org/forum/viewtopic.php?t=|forum site]]</nowiki> for communication.  PNW team meeting can be called if needed.

 '''Project Lead:''' ''H264''

 '''Project Team:''' ''Oregon Washington and PNW''

 '''Meeting Details:''' ''Next meeting on: pending''

=== Quality Management Plan ===
Team will vote on the best pictures submitted to include with the package at a (predefined) future team meeting. 

== Project Outline and Scope ==
* Accept submissions from users by the 5th
** Verify image hight / width and size - 1024x768 min.
** Verify that images can be referenced as Public Domain material
** Choose our team's favorite images.

* Create the art package and try to get it hosted in apt repositories.
 
* Roll the a couple of the Background images in with the live CD ISO

* Project closing
** Verify team approval
** Postmortem documentation
** Send closing email
